CustomField.description: Recall button on My Timesheet that will change the Status of any Timesheets for the Week to "Recalled" Status whereby the Timesheet Status is Submitted.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Recall button on My Timesheet that will change the Status of any Timesheets for the Week to "Recalled" Status whereby the Timesheet Status is Submitted.
CustomField.label: Enable Timesheet Recall
